about.details:
Incorporated in 2020, Toss the Coin Limited is a marketing consulting company that provides custom-made marketing services to clients.

The Company offers marketing consulting services for B2B Tech Companies. They have experience working with multiple technology organizations, big and small, to craft their GTM strategies from branding, content development, designs, websites, social media campaigns, customer success management, and design thinking-based problem-solving workshops to consulting.

As of September 30, 2024, The Company has 43 employees.

Their Services:

  • CMO (Chief Marketing Officer) Office: As a CMO office, They offer strategic consulting and advisory to small and medium enterprises.
  • GTM (Go To Market) Office: This is the go-to-market service that they offer to clients as short-term projects, organizations to build their brand identity (logo, brand positioning), website strategy and development, and GTM collaterals like pitch presentations, brochures, and emailers.
  • Sales Enablement: They offer demand generation, Request for Proposal strategy and content, and performance management.
  • Design Studio: This is their bespoke design studio. Under this, they offer all kinds of graphics and video services. This includes presentation enhancements, graphic designing, video production, UX/UI, and 3D designing.
  • Internal Branding: This is the CMO office for major GCC (Global Capability Center) players, Under this, they offer employer branding services to attract and retain talent.
  • Kathai AI Solutions: This is the dedicated AI-based API (Application Programming Interface) production vertical. This is an internal vertical where they aim to build AI APIs to solve the most common marketing challenges.

Their Strengths:

  • Specializing in tech B2B allows them to understand industry trends and deliver tailored, effective solutions.
  • The smaller size enables rapid adaptability, letting us adjust strategies and respond quickly to feedback.
  • They offer personalized attention, creating stronger client relationships that lead to loyalty and valuable referrals.
  • They innovate and experiment with new strategies, technologies, and creative campaigns to differentiate themselves.
  • Lower overhead costs allow them to offer competitive pricing, making them attractive to budget-conscious clients.
  • They prioritize customer needs, providing exceptional service that fosters long-term, trust-based business relationships.
  • Their strong digital marketing capabilities, combined with continuous learning, ensure they stay ahead in the market.

faqs.question: What is the Toss The Coin IPO?
faqs.answer:
Toss The Coin IPO is a SME IPO of 504000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹9.17 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹182 per share. The minimum order quantity is 600.

The IPO opens on December 10, 2024, and closes on December 12, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Toss The Coin IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Toss The Coin IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Toss The Coin IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Toss The Coin IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Toss The Coin IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Toss The Coin IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Toss The Coin IPO opens on December 10, 2024 and closes on December 12, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Toss The Coin IPO?
faqs.answer: Toss The Coin IPO lot size is 600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,09,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Toss The Coin IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Toss The Coin IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Toss The Coin IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Toss The Coin IPO will be done on Friday, December 13, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, December 16, 2024. Check the Toss The Coin IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Toss The Coin IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Toss The Coin IPO listing date is on Tuesday, December 17, 2024.
